name: The Peace of Whales
description:
Finding your inspiration is one of the key elements in creativity. When I think of a whales I hear their songs. I feel their movement.

When I  lived  on the south coast of New South Whales I saw many whales each migration season. Scanning the sea is something I still do here in my new home on the Kent Coastline. My cold water swimming friends often mention it.

I know the days they would be out there if there wasn’t all that shipping traffic passing through the Channel.

I paint these creatures to remind us of the importance of our oceans and seas and the creatures that live in them. 

The Peace of Whales is the first watercolour of a whale I’ve done and the first in a new series of whale paintings.
